name: df-1r
body: |- wceq(c1r, cec(cop(co(c1p, cpp, c1p), c1p), cer))
comment: Define signed real constant 1. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-4.2 of [Gleason] p. 126. (Contributed by NM, 9-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
